javadoc:
Utility class to Search for Files in any directory
 All one needs is to call FileSearcher.gatherFilesFromDir and 
 provide the necessary file extension(s) and the list will be returned.

methods.name: gatherFilesFromDir
methods.comment:
Gather's all Files from the Directory
 that have the passed in File Type Extension.
 Returns this List of Files Found.

params.name: currFileTypeExtList
params.comment: - The List of File Type Extensions to Search for

params.name: useRecursionInSearch
params.comment: - Determine whether to Search recursively or not

return.comment: - List of Files that were found

name: FileSearcher
comment:
Utility class to Search for Files in any directory
 All one needs is to call FileSearcher.gatherFilesFromDir and 
 provide the necessary file extension(s) and the list will be returned.
